mapper.insert: insert into customer (username, phone, QQ, company, company_longitude, company_latitude, home, home_longitude, home_latitude, integral, avatar) values (#{username}, #{phone}, #{QQ}, #{company}, #{company_longitude}, #{company_latitude}, #{home}, #{home_longitude}, #{home_latitude}, #{integral}, #{avatar})
mapper.select:
select * from customer
and username like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
